duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support to the D&I advisors in the completion of enterprise-wide initiatives such as events, trainings, applications, and communications.
Maintain the SharePoint, D&I webpage, and other tools used in D&I analysis.
Support advisors in tracking training assignments and department communications.
Offer a supporting role in D&I deliverables to other departments.
Perform other duties as assigned (no more than 5% of duties).

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate and/or Graduate coursework in Diversity & Inclusion, Statistics, Human Resources, or related specialty, required.The successful candidate must be currently enrolled as a junior/senior in a bachelors and/or master's program at an accredited college.
